ROOT:
-- DaoT_CurrentWorkflow_S2_Select -- 2014/7/4 日立 太郎 SELECT [WorkflowControlNo], [HistoryNo], [WfPositionId], [FromUserId], [FromUserInfo], [ActionType], [ToUserId], [ToUserInfo], [NextWfPositionId], [ReserveArea], [ExclusiveKey], [ReplyDeadline], [CreatedDate], [AcceptanceDate] FROM [T_CurrentWorkflow]
WHERE [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNo
